channel.title: PI Bosses
channel.description: Some bosses dont work such as corp, it doesn't attack them it just walks over to it and stands in front of it. I'm guessing somewhere there is a resetPlayerAttack(); where I don't want it but I cant seem to find it. I searched npc id 8349 for the tormented demon, and all of it was just regular code, nothing that I saw that would prevent me from attacking it

item.title: PI Bosses
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:4, topic:395905”]npc = 8349 Tormented_Demon 450 254 and replace the first part of your tormented demons with this in npc.cfg
Change corp beast npc id to 8133 in npc.cfg[/quote]
Only fixed the corp

Read full topic

item.title: PI Bosses

item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

npc = 8349 Tormented_Demon 450 254 and replace the first part of your tormented demons with this in npc.cfg
Change corp beast npc id to 8133 in npc.cfg
